subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Despite a five-game winning streak and a 2-0 lead after the first period Tuesday night, the Rangers gave up five goals in a miserable second period and lost to the Montreal Canadiens.
snippet: Despite a five-game winning streak and a 2-0 lead after the first period Tuesday night, the Rangers gave up five goals in a miserable second period and lost to the Montreal Canadiens.
